availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ebenezer B. Frost (Hopkins County, wagon maker, carriage maker, and mechanic)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, carriage maker and mechanic. Tennessee native. Son of Isham Frost and Mary W. Frost. Married to Mary H. Frost. Father of Kate Frost. Wagon maker in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned five enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1850. Carriage maker in Hopkins County in 1860. Mechanic in Hopkins County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 51A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 697.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 798.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Hopkins County, KY, July 1863, p. 20.
